main event: Two observers in Indiana saw a bright glowing object in the sky that would momentarily disappear and reappear.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes with no sound heard., Capt. Arnold reported seeing a round or oval object with a reddish light northwest of Terre Haute., The object lit up suddenly before disappearing., The observation was similar to another sighting 23 miles southeast of Terre Haute., Further investigation later judged earlier reports to be observations of a weather balloon.
sighted object: a bright glowing object in the sky
